node_types.label: Input
node_types.description: External data or condition entering the chain (e.g., report, event, user input).

node_types.label: Decision Point
node_types.description: A human or system-based decision node that branches the path (CPS screen-in, judge ruling).

node_types.label: Action
node_types.description: A concrete action taken based on decision output (e.g., remove child, assign service).

node_types.label: Outcome
node_types.description: A system or life result caused by prior actions (e.g., foster placement, TPR granted).

node_types.label: Failure Cascade
node_types.description: A harm state reached due to misuse or system flaw (e.g., child runaway, false TPR).

node_types.label: PMC Intervention
node_types.description: Actionable safeguards proposed by Guardian/PMC to interrupt failure or restore rights.

node_types.label: Violation / Statute Conflict
node_types.description: Flag generated by AnalystWorker when legal conflict or ethical breach is detected.

edge_types.label: Causal Flow
edge_types.description: Logical or temporal flow from one node to the next in the chain.

edge_types.label: PMC Recommendation
edge_types.description: Connection between a harmful action/outcome and a proposed intervention.

edge_types.label: Triggered By
edge_types.description: Edge showing which law, policy, or data caused the node to activate.

edge_types.label: Violates
edge_types.description: Indicates a system action that breaches a statute or protected right.
